titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for explaining and enlarging his Maiesties former orders for buildings, in and about London
Proclamations. 1620-07-17
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Theobalds the seuenteenth day of Iuly, in the eighteenth yeere of our reigne ..
In this edition the first line of text ends "grounded"; the arms have a rose and thistle at top (arms 11).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
